meanings: Verb be explained, be clarified, be elucidated

vlive.korean: [몰아가는 사람은 4명인데 해명 듣는 사람은 0명인 우당탕탕의 현장] 아니야, 야! [4 are ganging up but none are listening, it's chaos] No, hey! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 우당탕식스의 (..버퍼링 중입니다..) 오째 생일파티🦀🎉 (HAPPY DAEHWI DAY!)
vlive.english: [4 are ganging up but none are listening, it's chaos] No, hey!

vlive.korean: 해명이라뇨~ What do you mean, explain?! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 다시‼️
빨리 해명 시간 가지세요! Please spend this time on telling your excuse! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Rocket Punch X LieV - 로켓펀치의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Please spend this time on telling your excuse!

vlive.korean: 봐봐 내가 앞에 있었어 - 내가 해명할 수 있... I was standing in front. - I can explain... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Room(투키즈룸)] VOL.5 Ep.08 창빈 X 현진
vlive.english: I was standing in front. - I can explain...

vlive.korean: 오늘 왜 이렇게 잘생겼는지 해명해달라고요? You want me to explain why I'm so handsome today? 듣기 View video VICTON : 밤이에요 앨리스!!!
vlive.english: You want me to explain why I'm so handsome today?

examples.korean: She saw his frown and hastened to explain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그의 찡그린 얼굴을 보고 서둘러 해명을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She saw his frown and hastened to explain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a feeble attempt to explain 듣기 Add to Wordbook 해명을 하려는 미미한 시도 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a feeble attempt to explain Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: to get / give sb a fair hearing 듣기 Add to Wordbook 공평한 해명 기회를 갖다/~에게 주다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to get / give sb a fair hearing Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Oh well then, that explains it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아 좋아, 그렇다면 그게 해명이 되는군. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh well then, that explains it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: an explanation as to why he had left early 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 일찍 떠난 이유에 대한 해명 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an explanation as to why he had left early Add to Wordbook
